entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , North Battleford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:43 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -13.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Battleford Airport 03:00 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -13.5°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -14.9°C
Wind: E 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 03:18 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Fog dissipating. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 03:18 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 03:18 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022
